desc: Coral & Tusk creates spirited embroidered textiles for home and gifting. Founded in 2007 by designer Stephanie Housley, Coral & Tusk's creative process is a special alchemy of storytelling, illustration, and machine embroidery. Shop throw pillows, table linens, holiday decor, gifts, and more!

layout.text: Shop pillows and tea towels that will make your friends and family feel right at home.
